021import net.tnemc.core.TNECore;
022import net.tnemc.plugincore.PluginCore;
023import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.compatibility.PlayerProvider;
024import org.jetbrains.annotations.NotNull;
025
026import java.util.List;
027import java.util.Optional;
028import java.util.UUID;
029
030/**
031 * RegionMode
032 *
033 * @author creatorfromhell
034 * @since 0.1.2.0
035 */
036public interface RegionMode {
037
038  String name();
039
040  List<RegionType> accepted();
041
042  default String defaultRegion() {
043
044    return TNECore.eco().region().defaultRegion();
045  }
046
047  default String region(@NotNull final UUID player) {
048
049    final Optional<PlayerProvider> provider = PluginCore.server().findPlayer(player);
050    if(provider.isPresent()) {
051      return region(provider.get());
052    }
053    return defaultRegion();
054  }
055
056  String region(@NotNull final PlayerProvider player);
057}
